thread.section_title: Greenwich Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic Hotel - Review of Greenwich Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kondwani J
title: Fantastic Hotel
text: Really great location. I love the aesthetics of both the interior and exterior of the hotel. The beds are extremely comfortable, the sheets were very clean, and the room space was perfect for the occasion. The professionalism and service from staff was also very incredible. I had misplaced my phone in the building, and one staff member, Yesenia, was gracious enough to spend some time assisting me in successfully locating it. I cannot thank her enough for that. The complimentary perks were an added bonus to the experience. I will most definitely make a return in the near future without a doubt.
